Here are the areas of Rtraining that you can peruse

```{r, echo=FALSE}
fileTbl<-function(f,name, yml=TRUE){
  names<-gsub(".Rmd","",basename(f))
  gettitle<-function(x){
    res<-readLines(x)
    gsub("(title: )|[[:punct:]]","",res[2])
  }
  ymls<-lapply(f,gettitle)
  if(yml) titles<-ymls
  if(!yml) titles<-names
  df<-data.frame(paste0(" [",titles,"](",names,".html)"))
  names(df)<-name
knitr::kable(df)
}
fileTbl(slidedecks,"Presentations")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
fileTbl(shinydecks,"Shiny presentations (not interactive)")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
fileTbl(handouts,"Handouts",yml=FALSE)
```
